subject: Football
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Buccaneers acquired the Jets’ All-Pro cornerback, Darrelle Revis, who agreed to terms with Tampa Bay on a new long-term contract, for six years and $96 million.
snippet: The Buccaneers acquired the Jets’ All-Pro cornerback, Darrelle Revis, who agreed to terms with Tampa Bay on a new long-term contract, for six years and $96 million.
